Title: Maintain the excrement and urine ditches and prevent the breeding of the five evils.
Publisher: Fujian Province Association for the Popularisation of Science and Technology, Fujian Province People's Science Academy (福建省科學技術普及協會, 福建省人民科學館 ), Fuzhou
Notes: The banner left of the window says "Labour is most honourable" (劳动左光荣).
